org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata

Interface ScriptDocValues<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Collection<T>, Iterable<T>, List<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScriptDocValues.Doubles, ScriptDocValues.GeoPoints, ScriptDocValues.Longs, ScriptDocValues.Strings

    public interface ScriptDocValues<T>
extends List<T>
    Script level doc values, the assumption is that any implementation will implement a getValue and a getValues that return the relevant type that then can be used in scripts.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ScriptDocValues.Doubles 
      static class  ScriptDocValues.GeoPoints 
      static class  ScriptDocValues.Longs 
      static class  ScriptDocValues.Strings 

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Return a copy of the list of the values for the current document.

      Set the current doc ID.
